name: Daniel Ek
title: CEO and Co-Founder
notes: Visionary CEO focused on audio platform expansion beyond music. Limited direct engagement.

name: Paul Vogel
title: Chief Financial Officer
notes: CFO focused on path to sustained profitability. Key decision-maker for technology spend.

name: Gustav Soderstrom
title: Chief Product and Technology Officer
notes: Long-tenured executive overseeing product and tech. Strong CloudSense advocate for internal tooling.
